import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { createUserWithEmailAndPassword } from "firebase/auth"; import { auth } from '../firebaseConfig'; function Register() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [name, setName] = useState('') const handleSubmit = () => { createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth, email, password) .then((userCredential) => { const user = userCredential.user; console.log(user) }) .catch((error) => { const errorCode = error.code; const errorMessage = error.message; }); } return (
